decisions.what: Automate sprint reporting process instead of manual updates
decisions.context: Required to fill out sprint reports every sprint per company mandate. Team decided to automate KPI tracking, deliverables capture, learnings extraction, and sprint planning rather than manual updates

decisions.what: Company-wide sprint alignment starting Jan 5 (Monday) instead of team preference for Tuesday
decisions.context: Company guidance mandates all sprints start Jan 5, overriding team's preference to maintain Tuesday sprint starts for office alignment

decisions.what: Use event-driven Jira webhooks for sprint completion tracking
decisions.context: Event-driven approach preferred over time-based scripts to handle different timezones and varying sprint completion times

decisions.what: VMS mobile app development delayed to Q2, starting February
decisions.context: January will focus on 2 new physical products and OTP iteration, pushing mobile app work to February

decisions.what: Price Sets experimentation feasible for single product family brands
decisions.context: Good Chop can use Price Sets for classic-box product family, excluding trial boxes and OTP from experiments

entities.name: U03TY4YJU4X
entities.context: Lead coordinator driving automation initiatives, AHM presentation, and Q1 planning

entities.name: U027201FQSV (Alex)
entities.context: Leading automation for sprint deliverables and planning, working on Good Chop price experimentation

entities.name: Good Chop (GoC)
entities.context: Brand experiencing issues, working on price experimentation, achieved free cuts on reactivation success

entities.name: The Pets Table (TPT)
entities.context: Team scaled from 5 to 14 contributors in Q4, achieved 25% gross CVR improvement with Free Items launch

entities.name: VMS (Virtual Multi-Service)
entities.context: Tracks Factor penetration KPI (baseline 0.32%), planning mobile app launch in Q2

entities.name: MIO (Market Innovation and Optimization)
entities.context: Private Jira project tracking confirmed orders KPI, team doesn't use traditional sprints/retros

entities.name: Wallet Migration
entities.context: Consumed ~30% of engineering capacity in 2025 to fit Good Chop requirements, identified as biggest learning

entities.name: PM-OS
entities.context: System proposed for automating learning extraction from discussions and updates

entities.name: Christmas Box
entities.context: Launched for AU, NZ, CA as one-time box without subscription, new seasonal revenue stream

entities.name: Price Sets
entities.context: Price experimentation tool, currently supports single product family, planned for Feb implementation

entities.name: U087178ACSD
entities.context: Responsible for automating KPI movement tracking as part of 2026 P0 work

entities.name: U01BT6RE4JG (Wander)
entities.context: MIO team member, manages on-call schedule, doesn't use Miro/Sprints/Retros

entities.name: U09D8BZ9891
entities.context: VMS lead tracking Factor penetration, planning mobile app and physical products

blockers.description: Backend work required for Price Sets to support multiple product families
blockers.impact: Delays price experimentation for brands with multiple product families until Feb

blockers.description: VMS Factor penetration OKR unlikely to change in Q1 due to mobile app delay
blockers.impact: Q1 OKR targets may not be achievable, need alternative quick wins

blockers.description: Automation of 'Key Learnings' section is tricky due to unclear definition
blockers.impact: May require manual curation or AI summarization from retros/meeting notes

blockers.description: Video requirement for sprint reports with no clear automation path
blockers.impact: May need to rely on internal demo recordings or PR/ticket attachments

blockers.description: MIO Jira project access restricted by default
blockers.impact: Blocked automation access, resolved by adding team members

action_items.task: Automate KPI movement tracking based on north star KPIs
Lead automation for sprint deliverables capture (Epic level + improvements)
Automate planned deliverables for next sprint
Submit candidates for AHM presentation (biggest win, learning, unexpected moment)
Fill out AHM presentation with numbers, screenshots, and content
Check New Year's Dinner invite for Berlin team members
Create Q1 OKR calculations ticket PA-25652
Identify quick win opportunities for VMS Factor penetration in Q1
Add team members to MIO Jira project

key_context.summary: Company mandates bi-weekly sprint reports via Google Sheets. Team is building comprehensive automation using Jira webhooks, Gemini AI for retro notes, and PM-OS for learning extraction to eliminate manual effort.
key_context.relevance: Critical for reducing team overhead and maintaining compliance with company reporting requirements

key_context.summary: Major wins include 25% CVR improvement from Free Items (TPT), free cuts on reactivation doubling conversion (GoC), Christmas box launch (AU/NZ/CA), and AI workflow embedding. Key learning was Wallet Migration consuming 30% eng capacity.
key_context.relevance: Demonstrates team impact and informs strategic priorities for 2026

key_context.summary: Squad KPIs mapped: GoC/TPT track Net Revenue, VMS tracks Factor penetration (0.32% baseline), MIO tracks confirmed orders. VMS mobile app delayed to Q2, requiring alternative quick wins for Q1.
key_context.relevance: Sets performance targets and identifies resource allocation needs for upcoming quarter

key_context.summary: Price Sets system available for single product family brands. Good Chop can experiment on classic-box family. Multi-family support requires backend work planned for February.
key_context.relevance: Enables revenue optimization experiments while clarifying technical constraints

key_context.summary: TPT scaled from 5 to 14 contributors. MIO operates without traditional sprints/retros. Company mandating sprint alignment to Jan 5 start date across all teams despite local preferences.
key_context.relevance: Highlights growth trajectory and need for flexible automation to accommodate diverse team workflows

summary: New Ventures team is automating mandatory bi-weekly sprint reporting using Jira webhooks and AI while preparing Q1 2026 OKRs and reflecting on 2025 achievements including major conversion improvements and infrastructure migrations.
